ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: Hybrids have there magic skills capped over 200, talked with a 44th lvl ranger over the weekend, he said they cap at 215. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
Hybrids have there magic skills capped over 200, talked with a 44th lvl
ranger over the weekend, he said they cap at 215.

Rokenn


>From: jhenders@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Caps
>Date: Sun, 21 Nov 1999 05:45:13 -0800
>
>On Sun, Nov 21/99, chris <cjeffrey@...> wrote:
> > From: "chris" <cjeffrey@...>
> >
> > Then that is really wrong. Im sorry but every class has something they
>are
> > really good at and Bards should be singing and playing instruments and
>for
> > us males Dancing (haha sorry ladys I had to say it ;) ) it is wrong of
>them
> > to cap it off at 200. We really need to write GZ a letter and ask them
>to
> > change that. Paladins are hybrids but they can max thier weapon skills
>out
> > at 255 same thing with ranger from what i hear.
> >
>
>No actually, almost all the melee classes get capped at 200 too. I
>think only monks and rogues go over 200 in any melee skill. Only casters
>ever see skill improvements over 200.
>
>
